column1: goes beyond any ill-conceived policy, it goes beyond any ill-conceived policy and our hearts go out to her family and friends. "I have been told by both the Chancellor and our Chancellor that we have a duty on all higher education institutions to act in the best interests of students and they are not doing so. "We have a duty on higher education institutions to be fair, compassionate and professional. "As a university we are committed to the values we believe in and to ensuring that all students have a safe and secure education. "We would like to hear from all families affected and to send the support they need to the Scottish Government. "The Scottish government has set out a duty for higher education institutions to act in the best interests of students and to ensure their wellbeing. "I am very pleased that we have started the campaign to send the support that we need. "We have a duty on higher education institutions to be fair, compassionate and professional.
